data.title: Welcome Home in SK and AB
data.meta_description: Make renting with Avana the start of your next chapter. Discover your dream home in vibrant communities across Regina and Edmonton.
data.text:
Avana builds a better

foundation.

community.

tomorrow.

Welcome Home.

Make renting with Avana the start of your next chapter. Discover your dream living space in the vibrant communities we call home in Regina, Saskatchewan and Edmonton, Alberta.

Find Your Dream Place Today

I am looking for:

Featured Spaces in Regina & Edmonton.

Upcoming Development Projects

2339 Willow Road

Regina, Saskatchewan

Welcome to the Avana Family.

Enjoy the peace and comfort of sharing birthdays, anniversaries, and new beginnings in your home. Avana’s attainable, safe, quality housing offers a sense of community beyond four walls. Now available in Edmonton, Alberta and Regina, Saskatchewan.

Testimonials.

“I moved into one of Avana’s new buildings in July of 2020, and it has been a wonderful experience. My Property Manager, Lori, and Maintenance Manager, Mark, are very attentive, professional, accommodating, and, frankly, a fair bit of fun too (Lori's a hoot).”

“My roommates and I found Avana back in August when looking for a place for the school year. From the minute we looked at the place to everyday experiences as residents, it has been a breeze. We are planning on moving to a larger place and hope to still rent with Avana. Highly recommend them.”

“Avana offers premium, yet affordable, homes that are thoughtfully finished and well maintained. I will always recommend Avana as the number one rental company in Regina - they take care of you like you're their family!”

“I had a wonderful experience with Mark. He's always helpful and goes above and beyond to ensure I have everything I need. No matter if it’s winter or summer. Whenever I have any problem regarding maintenance, he is always at my door on the same day. He is also very understanding and easy to communicate with. I have been living in Avana Homes since April 2021 and renewed our lease further for more time. I highly recommend Avana and Mark.”

"Friendly neighbours, great school, nice location and affordable rent! Special thanks to my property manager Marie and Kelsey, who offered great help with my earlier moving. Thanks, Avana! I wish you all the best!"

"Relocating to a new city and country can be very challenging but knowing you have help around relieves some of the stress. Renting with Avana has been one of my best decisions since I landed in Regina. Thanks to Mark. He's always super helpful and responds to our requests swiftly. Thank you, Mark & Avana!"

"I've lived with Avana in the South end for almost two years, and I have nothing but good things to say about them. Currently working on my transfer to the East end, and Kelsa Rabound has been fantastic to work with. She met all my requests and set me up with my new home in just a few days."
